name: api-connector-ai
description: Universal API management platform with natural language queries and zero-setup HTML integration

scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python app.py

author: API Connector AI Team
